Transcription for 1013626

O, you who know, O, you who know.
Hulio, you who live, Hulio, you who live,
Where you are, where you come, heaven and prayer,
Marilynなる
Thy healing, thy light, thy glory, our God,
There in the earth, and now in the day,
Thy holy fire, our God, our Savior, there.
Blessed are God, blessed are God,
Joy, joy, and joy, in heaven and earth,
Blessed are we, blessed are we, our God,
God of our heart, our praise for your name.
Blessed are God, blessed are God,
And through our prayer, Lord, we hope that you will be
Blessed are God, Lord, our God,
Holy and holy, and very holy, Lord.
